name: abap-code-review-guide
description: Collect ideas and approaches for reviewing ABAP code.

scripts.test: npm run links && asciidoctor-web-pdf -r asciidoctor-plantuml -r asciidoctor-kroki -d book -D build abap-code-review/src/index.adoc -a stylesheet="asciidoctor-pdf/css/asciidoctor.css,asciidoctor-pdf/css/document.css,asciidoctor-pdf/css/features/title-page.css,custom.css"
